Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel close to everything.”
Reviews.Author: Dave K
Reviews.Content: lovely hotel nice city 2 mins walk shops pubs ect lovely view canal nice time tea coffee machine idea free wifi easy stay touch home bad bed brick walking hours id love nice soft bed stay wasnt changed beds id defo stay

Reviews.Title: “Just perfect!!”
Reviews.Author: sante0910
Reviews.Content: husband stayed 3year anniversary chose stay priced literally 15mins walk rembrandt square worries night looking expensive taxis metros perfect decor cute prob bathrooms knees touch wall perks hotel outweigh minor 3rd floor lifts bit walking stairs burn booze food eat amsterdam breakfast 6euros person food worth 6euros cracking night free cups juice 24hrs day staff extremely helpful definate stay thanks staff hotel husband stayed 20th jan 2012

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and very pleasant surprise”
Reviews.Author: sampion
Reviews.Content: pleasant surprise 55 eur double wuth ensuite bathroom cant location excellent touristy bit overlooking lovely hermitage museum amstel canal lovely budget hotel amsterdam expect 5 star facilities purpose clean fresh linen comfortable ber pillows bathroom spotless try breakfast 9 eur person comment bit guests enjoy free breakfast ground floor pleasant perk guests yes walls bit thin hear guest charming dutch building normal efficent helpful information knowledgable recommend hotel using base trip amsterdam saving hotel cost spend lovely handmade chocolates buy puccini near opera house

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and quick service”
Reviews.Author: AlinaVel
Reviews.Content: action price cheaper hostel stayed night service efficient quick checking indeed toilet easy sit clean fresh negative pillow bad

Reviews.Title: “had a good time”
Reviews.Author: anastas n
Reviews.Content: friends summer nice time staff verry helpful stay amsterdam beautifull city visit

Reviews.Title: “Was a comfortable stay, for 2 nights”
Reviews.Author: gigglesxhx
Reviews.Content: hotel comfortable stay nights free drinks available stay bathroom nice close proximity negative aspects noise people walking stairs annoying trying sleep water pipes exposed dangerous

Reviews.Title: “A trendy hotel tucked away from all the hustle and bustle. A hidden gem!”
Reviews.Author: BandeleZuberiPhoto
Reviews.Content: love located quiet walking distance sights staff excellent extremely friendly fantastic trendy decor plenty space 5 bonus free wifi free coffeeteahot chocolate vending machine ill definitely stay visit amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Black & white wonder”
Reviews.Author: uehala
Reviews.Content: lived march 3 days located building inside modern comfortable friendly staff stylish hotel kitchen hallways decorated style black white color scheme nice windows warm clean comfortable hotel own kitchen convenient location heart amsterdam affordable price pleased

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel & service”

Reviews.Content: stayed fiancã© march 2011 lovely hotel value double inc free teacoffee day staff pleasant happy advise etc overlooked garden rear hotel shower clean 2 people issue lovely hotel comfort bed little bit hard liking people expected size hotel amsterdam didnt disappoint stayed paid lot charming hotel definitely worth money paid definitely despite bed location 5min walk busy rembrantplein waterlooplein

Reviews.Title: “It was the biggest disappointment”
Reviews.Author: Cuca1975
Reviews.Content: biggest disappointment photos hotel site reality hotel prosecuted appeals misleading advertising except bathroom cubicle fits person time sheets holes size bed protect mattress breakfasts cubicle simple kitchen cuisine home chairs scratched cat lives kitchen note cat nicest tip deceived worst hotel staying consider hotel shelter lowest understand hotel rated probably owner paid simply awful

Reviews.Title: “Nice Accommodation - worth the money (if you have cash) read on...”
Reviews.Author: RICK2020
Reviews.Content: friend stayed september 21 thru 25 2010 own single floor mine 4th single shower bathroom mine sink separate hall own private shower bathroom stay 408 separate bathroom didnt mind slightly larger didnt inside bathroom hotel nice boutique feel narrow cosy close amsterdam walkable city hotel 2025 minutes walk central station 30 minutes walk 2 stay 5 days relaying brick street front hotel starting 8am weekdays hear constant clank outside slept earplugs solved luckily weekends unfortunately friend floor whcih practically street level hear window permanently ajar 4 inches wooden beam noise comes issue read hotel review checked time pay told credit card machine pay cash stay 230 euros total able cant imagine happen counting paying credit card cash pretty scam hotel probably pay fee credit cards avoid fees hotel fine stay bigger hotel shady credit card issues time amsterdam worth visiting

Reviews.Title: “Over priced”
Reviews.Author: Frank12345186605
Reviews.Content: stayed hermitage hotel night poor value 5th floor size prison cell sloping roof stairs narrow dangerous despite saying wifi covers lower hotel am covered insect bites location staff helpful try avoid

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Hermitage Amsterdam
